communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Pennsylvania Change Requests 2.0
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of all materials, documents and communications related to the following change requests identified by their "CR number" and corresponding "CR Title" listed below.

Materials may include but are not limited to: emails, cost estimates, invoices and any documents used to evaluate, assess and determine the impact of the change request.

Copies of any documents and materials showing whether the change requests were accepted, rejected or deferred.

2122622: Modify FM logic so that OTI's can be issued to the correct budget & individual for the correct corresponding time
2885546: CHIP Enrollment first - Run PEBTF and HMS exchanges concurrently only AFTER CHIP MCO coverage has started
2888368: Always Align CHIP eligibility and enrollment dates systematically
2650967: LTC - Medical Expenses coded 12, 17, and 07 to calculate eligibility and show on all notices as deductions to the COC
2778157: T-MSIS: Updated Logic for ELG00012 Record Segment
2952981: CHIP 39-day denial/termination removal
1720881: Correct Expedited SNAP auto case comment logic
1932241: System incorrectly rolling up SNAP notices in certain scenarios
2100267: WLD: Union Requested to Place Assignment Search in a more prominent position
2100299: WLD: Union Requested to Have a field for appointment date and time for face-to-face and telephone interviews.
2162831: Union: Allow any worker to clear alerts/notifications regardless of what county/caseworker it is assigned to
2435804: TPL - Create TPL purge logic in eCIS to match the TPL purge that runs in CIS Quarterly
2613076: T-MSIS: Eligibility Change Reason
2635439: End of PHE -Automatically send an AVS request at renewal scheduling for the aged/blind/disabled MA categories subject to AVS
2646277: Include 'N' member heads of household in weekly CIS/PROMISe Recipient Base Extract file (pro10w01.dat)
2668598: Additional Waiver ID and Waiver Type Logic for T-MSIS Eligibility File
2691753: CHIP IT Transition MCO Transfer
2691771: CHIP IT Centre county coverage
2692094: DGS - Correspondence - Add "SAR", "Automated Renewal", "CIS", "LIHEAP" or "L/IN" Identifiers, as Applicable, on Return Address of Correspondence
2707197: T-MSIS: Update Dual Eligible Check in the ELG00003 Record Segment
2712791: CHIP IT - "Consent to move to MA" field must default to Yes
2712956: T-MSIS Eligibility File: Update Logic to Accommodate Multiple Race Code Selection
2728307: Transform CDE-MCO-TYPE values to 'K' for CHIP recipients on pro18wcare.dat file and P54/P58/P60 real-time responses
2748299: T-MSIS: Update to ELG156 Logic
2757706: End of Continuous Coverage - Do not allow benefit reductions during the unwinding period for COVID maintained population until renewal
2759225: Maintaining CHIP 12 month renewal date
2760215: CHIP application start date
2773377: COMPASS - Update Managed Care Organization Page
2773389: CHIP budgets need to align eligibility and enrollment date
2789453: COMPASS - Remove check box on MCA registration screen and build validation that doesn't allow users to enter an email address
2789824: eCIS - Client Notices - Notices for CHIP NCE Segments
2854663: CHIP MCO expansion - HPP

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samantha Liss
